Text: so which one is it: the simpsons or just friends?
damnit im annoyed i guess ill just dl and find out

Ok i downloaded it AND watched it. Great movie btw i thought it was rly funny. i luv ryan renolds. but so yea its just friends i have no idea y he wrote simpsons movie... very odd. 8.5/10 for overall quality and movie. : )
This is the "Just Friends" moive.  The reference to the Simpsons is wrong.
